input_text:
Job Title: Videographer - Marketing Manager

Location: Arlington, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Videographer - Marketing Manager Job Summary

This role will develop and ensure adherence to brand and ensure that all marketing activities and interactions are on brand, including trade shows, photography, videography, print and social media, etc. You will also create opportunities and sales materials for revenue generation.

Videographer - Marketing Manager Responsibilities

Develop and ensure adherence to branding guidelines, including graphic assets, logo and company collateral Manage all aspects of the company's involvement in global trade shows, including registration, logistics, coordination of insurance and everything related to the booth and attendance Responsible for all photography, videography, and graphic design for decks and presentations/demonstrations Social Media and Website Management Source all materials related to marketing, photography/videography, and trade show management Create OPORDs for team movement to/from destinations Assist research labs with photography, design, and high-speed footage that supports test data and highlights effectiveness of technology Develop in-roads with new media entities to create advocacy, notoriety, and social proof Work with several models and/or influencers to develop new media content Run solo recon with partners to write thorough, seamless plans for projects, team trips, or any other collaborative efforts Maintain relationships with partners to deepen our connection to their brands and to opportunities that stem from those relationships Create departmental pro-dev standards for utilization as the company expands Travel to domestic and international locations, as necessary 

Videographer - Marketing Manager Position Requirements

Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills Microsoft Office Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously High speed videography Bachelor’s degree in Marketing or in a related field or equivalent years of experience required 10+ years of experience in marketing and marketing strategy, graphic design, photography and videography required Proficient in photo/video adobe creative suite or similar software Digital marketing methodologies or strategy development preferred Strong knowledge of ITAR/ATF and other relevant laws and regulations

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Videographer - Marketing Manager
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing or in a related field
required_skills: Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
Proficient in photo/video adobe creative suite or similar software
Digital marketing methodologies or strategy development
Strong knowledge of ITAR/ATF and other relevant laws and regulations
job_responsibilities: Develop and ensure adherence to branding guidelines
Manage all aspects of the company's involvement in global trade shows
Responsible for all photography, videography, and graphic design
Source all materials related to marketing, photography/videography, and trade show management
Assist research labs with photography, design, and high-speed footage
Work with models and/or influencers to develop new media content
Run solo recon with partners to write thorough, seamless plans
Travel to domestic and international locations
output_json.travel_requirements: Travel to domestic and international locations, as necessary
